website_summaries.verdict: This is a well-organized, 17-piece kit where the parts can be used as they are without the addition of tape, making it a top choice.
pros: Impressive set to accompany an air compressor to ensure that it can be used to carry out virtually any desired task
Tape is not a necessity with this kit to guard against leaks when using nozzle attachments
Items come neatly organized in plastic container
cons: Included tire pressure gauge is not the most reliable

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer should mention do not use in cool weather. Spend the extra and buy Goodyear rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: In 40 degree weather the hose is very stiff. Not what expected. Manufacturer should mention do not use in cool weather. Spend the extra and buy Goodyear rubber hose. In this case with connections included not worth spending time to package again to send back! I have to admit I was a little harsh with the above review. PVC is stiffer than Rubber and I need to except that and I also knew that. Wynnsky does sell a very good quality rubber hose also. Didn't mean to trash the WYNNsky name. They are known for a number of quality products. They did contact me and offer a refund. Very Good Customer Service. Thanks WYNNsky
customer_reviews.author: R. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Inflator can''t be used with blow gun
customer_reviews.text: Grabbed this on Prime Day as it was a good deal. It's disappointing that there isn't a fitting included so you can use the tire inflator on the blow gun attachment, you have to use the inflator directly on the hose. This leaves you with no way to regulate air flow and the only way to stop air flow is to remove it from the valve stem.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this kit has been helpful and I like the hardware. However, the hose was very cheap, causing air leaks and immediately had to go to the hardware store to purchase a heavier duty hose. Once fitted with the hardware and a little teflon to keep things nice and tight, it was great. In hindsight, I wish I had just not purchased this and bought a better quality kit elsewhere. I found Ace Hardware to have some nice quality stuff that made all the difference in my new air compressor. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Works well, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. The fittings don't leak and seem to be good for the price. Haven't had a chance to use the tire inflator, but I assume it will work. Docked one star because there was no similar option that included a case from WYNNsky that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: The air compressor hose work fine but never holding 100% air compressor air tight
customer_reviews.text: The wynnsky 3/8”X 25ft PVC Air Compressor House With 17 Piece Air tool and Accessory kit.Air Accessories kit and Air hose.The air compressor hose works great and with all the accessories.But only for a hobbiest person to use it once in awhile only.Don’t buy this air compressor hose,if you’re going to uses and needed every day uses,because this air compressor house never hold 100% air tight compressor delivery through the hose all the time times for air compressing out.
customer_reviews.author: Chi N. Chu

customer_reviews.title: Good hose, nice fittings, smells bad.
customer_reviews.text: Im not someone who is usually bothered by chemical smells, but this hose just REEKS. It made the whole house stink like formaldehyde. Even after soaking it in soapy water for a day it still smells VERY strong. I have to keep it in the garden shed because it smells so bad. Other than that, its a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Chewd

customer_reviews.title: Very Flexiable and Light Air Hose
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this air hose is that it is light, long, and very flexible. The 3/8 inch size makes it very easy to move about allow you to get a lot of work done before moving your compressor. makes it very flexible . It does not come with connectors so you will need tape and end connectors and then you are ready to go. The orange color also makes it easy to see and avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Z

customer_reviews.title: Best jump rope ever!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing jump rope for multiple people! We have massive parties and love to bust this out for a rousing jump rope elimination game. The bright orange color helps for visibility. An added bonus is the air features that are included in the jump rope. The fittings are strong, and all the optional tools really help with any application I can think of... filling tires, blowing off dust, replacing other air fittings, and much, much more. Multi-function! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Rench

customer_reviews.title: Great except the hose is defective.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was surprised with how low cost the product is. However with my unluckiness, I received a bad unit. I wanted to give it five stars but since it is unusable because of the defective hose (one end leaks/defective), I had to retract a few stars back. The return window has closed as well. I should've just bought one at my local Homedepot, and I did. A Dewalt set was on sale for $19.99, plus the adapter is already connected to the hose (less chance of leaks).
customer_reviews.author: A Malvar

customer_reviews.title: OK for Occasional Use
customer_reviews.text: This hose is ok for occasional use in warmer weather. It is not built sturdy enough for every day use and the pvc will harden in cold weather. I took off a star because the hose smells bad and you still need Teflon tape for the male threads on the hose ends which is not included. Luckily I had some in the tool box. There are better hoses out there. I am just using this one on my small Senco compressor for my staple gun and auto tires.
customer_reviews.author: BSB

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this item with my Senco compressor and 18Gauge Brad nailer, and I'm happy to say that I experienced no issues. The attachments are clearly labeled and easy to use. The hose itself, is light weight and a good length. Overall, I'm pretty content with my purchase. The only downside is that it leaks air slightly where the attachments connect.
customer_reviews.author: Montano, A L

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product has a great array and variety to it, it is ultimately made of fairly cheap material but gets the job done nonetheless. For the money that you spend it's of great value, the hose is good material the metal add on's however are a little on the lower quality side. I would most certainly recommend this if you just need basic compressor materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times so far so this isn’t a review on longevity but works well as advertised. I put a little Teflon tape over the pre-doped thread for extra air tightness and have used it with several air tools. Make sure to use a wrench when torquing the connectors, not just hand tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The hose didn't last too long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit a couple months ago. The hose lasted about hours worth of VERY light use before completely leaking, bubbling up and unraveling. I should have taken a picture of it before tossing it in the garbage. It was ugly. But all the other accessories are still working fine, so I got that going for me! I will try a different brand now.
customer_reviews.author: JC Hammers

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this kit is very cheaply made the hose ends are crimped crooked and looks like they are going too break and leak every time I use it, the only reason I’m not giving 2 Stars is the quick chucks are decent and don’t leak air and connect easily.
customer_reviews.author: JRod

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: We had bought the large FunBoy water toys and we needed something tough enough to fill them. The air compressor we bought did not come with attachments so we purchased this. Problem solved. Rafts were ready to go. The hose.might be on the cheap side for use with pneumatic drills etc so keep that in mind
customer_reviews.author: Louann Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Used it for three hours, and the hose is already bubbling and leaking, DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!!!! IT HAS SCREWED ME ON THIS JOB, I had to drive 60 miles to lowes to buy a new one so I could get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Enock S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and does work for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: I just got the products , quality is good and does work as described. The main purpose I bought it was for winterizing sprinkles , which I got done from an vendor until now . will have to see how its going to work next winter
customer_reviews.author: BNKV

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the hose that was a factory add-on to the compressor purchase, that means buying a new and fittings then hope they work. This product comes with a hose and enough fittings to get the hose that I need, and, some other components that I haven't figured out yet. Great value. Highly recommend. TNX
customer_reviews.author: sonnyj

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The hose and connectors all work as expected. The hose is a little on the stiff side when compared to older rubberized hose, but will hopefully last a longer time. I have used it with nail guns and simple tire inflation without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B

customer_reviews.title: Need extra fitting to setup inflator
customer_reviews.text: Pro: all items seem leak proof with proper installation (Teflon). Hose seems durable. Con: need a 1/4 NPT to 1/8 NPT to attach tire chuck to air trigger. That’s an extra part I had to wait for just to inflate my tires.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Duke Fantastic

customer_reviews.title: Good value -- needs better instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. All that's missing is a decent instruction sheet to show a newbie how to assemble and the various attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Travis

customer_reviews.title: Complete Package
customer_reviews.text: The hose smells really bad out of the package, but I left outside in the sun (and rain) for a few days, and it stopped smelling bad. I don’t notice it at all anymore. All the pieces are there and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: SO SO
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the accessory are cheap. Hose is ok however.
customer_reviews.author: Brain Power

customer_reviews.title: Buy two of these
customer_reviews.text: I use with the pancake compressor. Wound up buying two, so I no longer have to move the compressor, even though it's not that difficult to move, just nicer connecting additional hoses as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hermann

customer_reviews.title: Nice little starter set!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for the house. Would of liked to see some more options for an air nozzle but no big deal, they are cheap anywhere. I’d say this is a must have for a new homeowner that does DIY.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Cheddle

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and sturdy hose
customer_reviews.text: Was bought as replacement to my air compressor hose. Good quality hose and easy to use with great tools included. The toolset alone was worth the purchase price. Have used a lot just got last week. I see it getting a lot of use very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money, but it is really light duty
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap air accessory set. Forthe money it isn't bad. If you're going to use it a couple or three times a month its great. Much more than that and I think it would be a good idea to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: m s

customer_reviews.title: My low expectations were surpassed!
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this being 1/3rd of this set in most other stores, I was expecting out of the box failures. Instead, to my delight, the hose seems quite durable, all parts were accounted for, and after using this a few times, I have had no issues. Great little starter kit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Snow_Man

customer_reviews.title: Good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it came with the little more instructions on how to build it but I did manage to get a good.
customer_reviews.author: gracie contreras

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the hose and a few attachments to add air to my trailer tires but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Hose is poor quality
customer_reviews.text: overall, you get what you pay for. the hose has a leak that started almost as soon as I hooked it up to my compressor. the leak is minor but empties my tank pretty quickly. (again, you get what you pay for)
customer_reviews.author: donovin mays

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to open the accesory containers. The two plastic halves looked like they'd snap apart, but never did. I ended up cutting them up.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It has a high variety of accessories. I have not used everything, but what I have needed works great. It was a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for all of the fittings and attachments
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my husband, he has the smaller size air compressor. He was very pleased with this and it was a great deal because it comes with all the attachments and fittings. Can't beat the price. Shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough not to blow out
customer_reviews.text: I got this hose to replace a cheaper hose that was attached to my air compressor. That hose blew out. I have had zero issues with this one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kosh

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job.
customer_reviews.text: It seems durable and well made, I'm not a mechanic just bought an air compressor to pump up tires and kids toys once in a while. I tested it out so far like 6 times, no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Goncalves

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product but Amazon Missed the mark
customer_reviews.text: Even though the product meets the need the hose is substandard and cheaply constructed. Now as far as Amazon is concerned. This is the fourth time in less than two months that they missed the scheduled delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: OmarR

customer_reviews.title: Poor design or build
customer_reviews.text: Nice collection of parts. Good air gun. Inflator does not work on bicycle or car poor designtires. Does not open Schrader valves.
customer_reviews.author: Roger the Consultant

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Looked around and saw this, and it comes with a bunch of extra attachments... worth the money for sure.. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C

customer_reviews.title: Good set for home or farm use
customer_reviews.text: For a PVC air hose this works pretty good compared to rubber. The adapters work with most air connectors. Overall good set for home use.
customer_reviews.author: M. GUERNSEY

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price.
customer_reviews.text: Package co rained everything I needed for a small compressor. Tape, fittings (male and female) hose etc. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. For the price you really get the value. I've bought compressors that were much more expensive and did not work half as well, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: MIKHAIL USHER

customer_reviews.title: Hose seems durable and has good length, but most of the fittings leak
customer_reviews.text: Hose seems durable and has good length, but most of the fittings leak. Have tried teflon tape and thread sealant and still experiencing air leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kraatz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Came with a leak and could not be used to fill up car tires. I wish I would’ve spent the money on a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me, love all the extras that comes with the hose. Remember to get a roll of Teflon tape 😀
customer_reviews.author: Roady

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy this again
customer_reviews.text: The fittings are alright, they do the job pretty well. But the hose leaks at both ends where it is crimped onto it's fittings. I will have to buy a better hose elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Received within 48 hours. The hose would of probably cost me about $15 on it's own, so I'm happy with a good variety of components for the additional $7. The connector's are solid. The blow gun and inflations knowledge are a little flimsy, but should be good for my purposes, both items needed Teflon tape. Only time will tell if the components are durable. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Quality fittings
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my 3 gallon compressor with this setup. The hose is good quality with good stainless steel fittings. Replace those dangerous factory components with higher psi rating fittings. For $12-13 bucks it's worth the safety IMO!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect. I liked the precoated sealer on the firings. Made assembly a lot simpler and a one step process.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great air compressor accessories
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He states that everything is still working well and holding up well after a couple month and nothing has broken.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described fits my compressor perfectly and works as its supposed to very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kevin roberts

customer_reviews.title: Quality Hi-Vis Air Hose
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems good, the fittings work smoothly and the hose appears to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Air blower nozzle leaks
customer_reviews.text: It leaks at the inside of the nozzle, not where the fitting is, so it hisses all the time and runs my compressor if I leave it connected even if I don't use it. Annoying!. All the fittings are low grade metal and I don't expect them to last too long, it was inexpensive but not worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Killian

customer_reviews.title: Smells like dead skunk
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but hose smells like a dead skunk.... thus 3 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: AM56

customer_reviews.title: Nice hose, leak in air gun
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 2 years now. The hose is great and the selection of fittings are nice. My only complaint is that my trigger nozzle thing leaks really bad. The leak is audible from 10ft away. The compressor (7 gallon) kicks on very 10-15 minutes to keep up with the leak. I guess I can't expect too much for what I paid for it
customer_reviews.author: matt rennert

customer_reviews.title: Hose is flexible enough.
customer_reviews.text: All of the fittings and the hose fit really well together. So far so good. I use my compressor with this set maybe once a week and I've had no issues with leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Dunkn

customer_reviews.title: This thing STINKS or SMELLS bad.
customer_reviews.text: This thing STINKS or SMELLS bad. It works and value is ok but it STINKS
customer_reviews.author: lookout

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: As was described. Great value, nice length and sturdy. Easy to roll up and store.
customer_reviews.author: CK N

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and every thing one needs to get started with air tools
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Use this for general purpose. Seems like it is made well.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The tools seem to work fine they feel a little cheap and not very heavy duty but with this price range it's to be expected. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality accessories for California Air Compressor
customer_reviews.text: This is quality accessories for the California Air compressor. Best selling compressor in the country in its price range.
customer_reviews.author: Con G.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, not first choice for professional use
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive compressor line with consumer grade attachments. Perfect for light use. I would be very suspect of the fittings if I was using this daily. For use around the house and occasional putterers, this is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Covers anything you want to do
customer_reviews.text: This is a good well rounded kit! Works great with my Porter Cable compressor. Nice to finally have all the attachments for whatever might need a shot of air.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Hose pops easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these and they were delivered on 12-14-18. As of this morning one of the hoses already has holes in it. Said it could handle 300 psi-my compressor is set at 170 psi. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura pabor

customer_reviews.title: Leaks air
customer_reviews.text: Seems to leak air from where it connects to air gun
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, quick disconnect fittings are a little loose so if there is any side pressure on them they leak. When a hose pulls from an angle. Most may never notice this.
customer_reviews.author: Zac Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I used this air hose as a replacement for one that blew out. This is heavier duty and seems solid. Not very easy to rewind because it is quite a bit thicker and heavier than I thought it would be. Connections seem strong and no leaks so far.
customer_reviews.author: TC Racer

customer_reviews.title: Great hose adapter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product . My order was on time . There is more pieces to hose more then I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people complain about attaching the tire inflator to the hose. If you are doing this it is wrong, several quick connect pieces come with it for the purpose of "quick connect"
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great pneumatic air hose exactly what I needed for my DIY projects at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh- could be better
customer_reviews.text: They do okay- they seem to slowly leak- and it is not clear if this is at the connections or somehow through the hose- lots of pieces but not sure what they all do- and no information on how to use them
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: A must for any compressor!
customer_reviews.text: I really like all the attachments and the distance I can go from my compressor!
customer_reviews.author: Barry August

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the money. Lots of useful attachments. The hose is thick and long enough to be able to complete most projects without having to move the air compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit for basic household use, ie: inflate pool toys, maintain vehicle tires pressure, blow dust. Very nice, durable hose. Includes accessories to get your tasks done quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Air leak in the house where it connects..... can fix w/thread tape for tight seal.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is a lousy product . It fell apart on my first attempt to use it ... #verycheap
customer_reviews.author: michael JY

customer_reviews.title: No comlaints.
customer_reviews.text: Use these often and have zero complaints. Very easy hose to coil. Fittings fit tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great compressor hose
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace an older hose that bubbled and cracked. Great replacement and I came with a bunch of accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Useful selection of tools. Arrived fast and well packaged. Quality very good.
customer_reviews.author: Caine Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Like everything in life. You get what you pay for. It’s was cheap, it is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what i need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: This is what i needed to do small jobs with an air compressor. Would be nice to have a storage case or bag included in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: DST

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: The whole package is pretty basic . The hose melted after 15 minutes of use . I’m keeping the fittings and switching hose brands
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set with a strong hose and multiple fittings that get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Scaren

customer_reviews.title: nice quality for your price
customer_reviews.text: good bang for your buck. especially for a starter set
customer_reviews.author: Bradley D Trisdale

customer_reviews.title: All Inclusive.
customer_reviews.text: I won a small air compressor and this kit has the things I will use on a daily basis. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Getz

customer_reviews.title: The perfect match for my new compressor
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good and all the pieces are practical and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: A lot of accessories for about $20. The few I've used so far worked well. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence G Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great air hose!
customer_reviews.text: Great air hose, came with a lot of accessories and everything I needed to air up my tires!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer walker

customer_reviews.title: Live and learn I suppose.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike this item because it was manufactured wrong. One piece wasn’t threaded for the correct assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Hose
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. It’s a hose and works great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Earnest

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter kit
customer_reviews.text: works great for what i use it for. Not used everyday by any means but a great kit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Evan T.

customer_reviews.title: Hose seems good and sturdy - attachments work but are light weight
customer_reviews.text: Hose seems good and sturdy - attachments work but are light weight. I don't think they will last long if used regurlarly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will need Teflon tape with this set
customer_reviews.text: A great beginners set. Good value, and works well for occasional use. Most connectors included are pretaped, however, the hose itself is not. Make sure to purchase some Teflon tape, to wrap those bare connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe K

customer_reviews.title: Delivers the air!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this kit. All the items are of good quality. The main thing is everything connected properly and it had many popular attachments.
customer_reviews.author: jerry b

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very durable so far. Will update if something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: The hose smell pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: The air accessories are good. But the hose smell pretty bad and the screw connections have air leaks. Return it.
customer_reviews.author: yijun yang

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love it,great price. Look durable,can’t wait to start using it.
customer_reviews.author: Krasimir Nikolov

customer_reviews.title: works great, nice price
customer_reviews.text: Works great, used several parts to blow out my sprinkler system this year.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

product_meta.title: WYNNsky 3/8" X 25ft PVC Air Compressor Hose Kit With 17 Piece Air Tool and Air Compressor Accessories Kit
feature_bullets: PVC material is designed for long life and light weight for your DIY projects
17 pieces air tool accessories kit, include all necessary air tools and air fittings.
Double 1/4" MNPT, Max working pressure of air compressor Hose is 300Psi
Solid brass end fittings never corrod and seal better than aluminum, steel, or zinc
Air accessories kit with air hose, Comes with a 2-years limited warranty

specifications.Size: 3/8 PVC Air Hose With 17 Pcs Accessories Kit
specifications.Material: 3/8 PVC Air Hose With 17 Pcs Accessories Kit
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars860 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
